column2: "Na Moses nye Israel mpanyimfo no hyɛɛ ɔman no dɛ
column3: Hom ndzi mbrasɛm a merehyɛ hom ndɛ da yi nyinara do."

column2: "Na ɔmbra dɛ
column3: da a hom botwa Jordan akɔ asaase a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze rema wo no do no

column2: "na kyerɛw mbra yi mu nsɛm nyinara wɔ do
column3: aber a etwa no; na aakɔ asaase a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze rema wo no do
column4: asaase a numfonsu nye ewo pem wɔ do no

column2: "Na ɔmbra dɛ aber a hom etwa Jordan no
column3: hom mfa abo yi a merehyɛ hom ndɛ da yi
column4: nsisi hɔ wɔ bepɔw Ebal do

column2: "Na hɔ na si afɔrmbukyia ma EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn
column3: abo afɔrmbukyia a: mma emma dadze edwindze do wɔ do."

column2: "Abo a wonntwae na fa si EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn afɔrmbukyia no: na bɔ ɔhyew afɔr wɔ do ma EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn:"
"na bɔ asomdwee afɔr
column3: na dzidzi wɔ hɔ; na gye w'enyi wɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn enyim."

column2: "Na kyerɛw mbra yi mu nsɛm nyinara petee wɔ abo no do."
"Na Moses nye Levifo asɔfo no kasaa kyerɛɛ Israel nyinara dɛ
column5: na hom ntsie; ndɛ da yi abɛyɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn ne man."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi tsie EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn ne ndze
column3: na dzi ne mbransɛm na n'ahyɛdze a merehyɛ wo ndɛ da yi do."

column2: "Na Moses hyɛɛ ɔman no da no ara
column5: "Iyinom na wongyina bepɔw Gerizim do nhyira ɔman no
column6: aber a hom etwa Jordan no; Simeon

column2: "na iyinom ngyina bepɔw Ebal do mpaa; Reuben
"Na Levifo no mfa ndze kɛse ntsea mu
column3: na wɔnse Israelfo no nyinara dɛ:"

column2: "Mpaa nka nyimpa a ɔbɛyɛ ohonyi a wɔasen anaa woegu
column5: na ɔdze besi kokoa mu. Na ɔman no nyinara mbua nse dɛ

column2: "Mpaa nka nyia ɔyaw n'egya anaa ne na. Na ɔman no nyinara nse dɛ
"Mpaa nka nyia ɔtwe ne nyɛnko n'asaasehe. Na ɔman no nyinara nse dɛ
"Mpaa nka nyia ɔma onyifurafo fi ɔkwan do kyin. Na ɔman no nyinara nse dɛ
"Mpaa nka nyia ɔdan ɔhɔho
column4: nye okunafo atsɛmbu enyi. Na ɔman no nyinara nse dɛ

column2: "Mpaa nka nyia ɔnye n'egya yer da; osiandɛ oeyi n'egya n'akataho. Na ɔman no nyinara nse dɛ
"Mpaa nka nyia ɔnye abowa biara da. Na ɔman no nyinara nse dɛ
"Mpaa nka nyia ɔnye n'akyerɛbaa da
column4: anaa ne na ne babaa. Na ɔman no nyinara nse dɛ

column2: "Mpaa nka nyia ɔnye n'asew da. Na ɔman no nyinara nse dɛ
"Mpaa nka nyia ɔbɔ ne nyɛnko adze nsumaa mu. Na ɔman no nyinara nse dɛ
"Mpaa nka nyia ɔgye mboaba dɛ oboku nyimpa a odzi bem. Na ɔman no nyinara nse dɛ
"Mpaa nka nyia ɔnnhyɛ mbra yi mu nsɛm dzen dɛ ɔbɛyɛ. Na ɔman no nyinara nse dɛ
